comments.body: Tata letak control yang bisa di ubah agar tidak susah menekanya

The touch controls work quite nicely, but there's one problem I have that makes combat on mobile really annoying, especially against baby zombies, and other fast moving mobs; that problem is that weapons and tools require a target to be swung, which is not a feature on Java. Allowing any tool or useable item to be swung without a target would significantly reduce the difficulty of fending off mobs, and including the sweep effect for swords and axes would also help immensely.
Please dd a second jump button above the joystick.

I like this idea, because as you said it's hard to kill endermans on bedrock. Let's say you want to get some pearls to go to the end, so you try to kill some endermans but they always teleport away from you when you hit them, which makes prosses tedious.
Me encantaria que mejoraran la animasion del cristal
What crystal? Amethyst clusters? End Crystals? Please specify and elaborate.
Please don't make it more complicated than it is currently. I just want a simple sorting/collecting pet mob I can duplicate and not need to compete with other players for.
I have a idea, what about a heart of amethyst, crafted w 10 amethyst blocks, that way we as players are encouraged to farm them, and it gets a little more harder to duplicate a allay
Just put next gen, no need for xbox, minecraft is a multiplataform game

I've looked and didn't see anything, apologies if I missed it. Cheers!

I play Bedrock and Java, and I feel Java is better. But I know Mojang is just trying their hardest. And besides, they're working on a whole update!
Definitely I have the same thing going on. Bedrock does need to be more recognized for sure, but don‚Äôt forget we bedrock players have BIG SALMON and that makes bedrock better ;)
yeah, if you are going to update one versoin of a game more than another then shouldn't you update the one more people have access to?

Copper is currently only available in the Java Snapshots and Bedrock Beta. The Nintendo Switch, however, does not have access to the Beta. 1.17, and thus Copper, is currently in development and will release in the Summer of 2021 for all platforms. Just be patient, the Switch will gain these features when 1.17 is complete.
We will, in the full release of 1.17.0
Mojang needs to accept that the community values quality over parity. They should never do anything that makes either game worse.
